description: With its custom import, channel packing, and automated export features, Bridge allows you to manage your assets in one place like never before. The days of manual shader setup, image conversion or sensitive folder structures are over; welcome to the future of asset management.  Send assets straight to 3ds max, UE4, Unity, Blender, Cinema 4D, Clarisse, Maya, Houdini and more, with automatic mesh and shader setup for all major renderers. Forget wondering how to correctly set up shaders or spending time hooking up map slots—just be creative.  Work in the format you want. Bridge offers a variety of formats — from the standard FBX and OBJ, to up-and-coming new standards like USD and MDL. Whatever you choose, we’ve got you covered.  Create channel-packing presets, use custom naming conventions, modify export scripts or easily create your own for any 3D software, engine or renderer—even your own. Unlock full API access to Megascans for all your custom pipeline needs, and stay in control.
summary: Manage all your assets and export to any tool.
author: Quixel,  Epic Games
